item.title: Line Graph (time series)
item.description: How to use a line graph to display changes over time in selected Lahman baseball database statistics. First, install packages: Lahman, dplyr, ggplot2, and ggiraph. Then bring them in with libary: library(Lahman) library(dplyr) library(ggplot2) library(ggiraph) In this example, we extract season homerun totals for Babe Ruth from the Lahman baseball database. df<-Batting%>% filter(playerID=='ruthba01')%>% select(yearID,HR) Then we use ggplot to visualize the data. Years are on the x-axis and homeruns are on the y-axis.
